response.headline: Greedy Scent perfume shop in Yeonnam, Seoul - custom fragrance experience with guided sampling
response.summary: Greedy Scent in Yeonnam offers a self-paced perfume sampling experience with everything you need to know provided in a leaflet. The shop features extensive fragrance collections displayed on white stone beds with organized sampling stations.

extracted_text: everything you need to know is in the leaflet so you can do it at your own pace
add this to your Seoul itinerary!

visual_hierarchy: White overlay text about leaflet guidance
Perfume sampling glasses on white stones
